Quick About

I'm Antimatter, or Yuv, and I do things sometimes. This website works as both a nice place to store my projects as well as explanations / concepts that I might be exploring. I tend to do a lot of 'nibbles' at different things, which means that I don't actually go far enough into for it to be worth writing a post about, but still pick up some nice skills along the way.

Favourite Projects

Right now, I don't really have enough projects to call any my favourite. However, the Coder One Hackathon and Frame of War are pretty cool (you should check them out).
